sections.header:
EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

This employment contract is entered into on {date}, between {employer_name} located at {employer_address} (hereinafter referred to as the 'Company'), and {employee_name} residing at {employee_address} (hereinafter referred to as the 'Employee').
sections.compensation:
2. Compensation
The Employee shall receive a salary of {salary} per year, payable in accordance with the Company's standard payroll practices.
sections.duration:
3. Duration
This agreement shall commence on {start_date} and continue for {duration}, unless terminated earlier in accordance with this agreement.
sections.jurisdiction:
4. Jurisdiction
This agreement shall be governed by the laws of {jurisdiction}.
